bug.author: feddybear
bug.description: m_ailabs RESULTS file only seems to point to the info.txt file and not the folder for the generated wav files themselves.

comments.comment: Sorry, the link is wrong. You can access from following url: <denchmark-link:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1q_66kyxVZGU99g8Xb5a0Q8yZ1YVm2tN0>https://drive.google.com/open?id=1q_66kyxVZGU99g8Xb5a0Q8yZ1YVm2tN0</denchmark-link>
